description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'Loader' that displays animated circles for a loading indicator. It includes component properties, state management, lifecycle hooks, and methods for animation.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component implementing a loading spinner with animated circles.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Begins an interval that toggles the alpha property to animate fade-in and fade-out of circles.
